title: Poster, URSS: XX Aniversario del la URSS./ Comision Nacional de Homenaje (URSS: Twentieth Anniversary of the URSS National Commission Tribute), 1937
title_raw: URSS: XX Aniversario del la URSS./ Comision Nacional de Homenaje (URSS: Twentieth Anniversary of the URSS National Commission Tribute)
signed: Signed on stone, top left: Arturo Ballester; at lower left, to left of image: ORTEGA-INTERVENIDO, U.G.T-CNT-VALENCIA
description: Spanish Civil War poster. Seen from the back, a muscular man pushes a young child up toward the letters URSS that stand out against glowing yellow and orange light against stylized wheat. The figures are strongly faceted and rendered in red. The legend across the bottom of posters is blue and black. A section of machinery is at left, suggesting the promise of union between agriculture and industry.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, URSS: XX Aniversario del la URSS./ Comision Nacional de Homenaje (URSS: Twentieth Anniversary of the URSS National Commission Tribute), 1937. Lithograph on wove paper/newsprint. 
Gift of William P. Mangold. 1997-21-20.
